revised_title: Preliminary Researches on Thallium: A New Element in the Periodic Table
tldr: In this article, William Crookes describes his discovery of a new element, Thallium, and its properties. He explains how he first suspected the presence of the element through spectroscopy and then details the methods he used to extract and analyze it. Thallium is a heavy metal with a high atomic weight, and it has unique chemical reactions, including the formation of two oxides and a chloride.
